# defaultToolTip

**Instance Property**

The text that appears in a tooltip by default.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var defaultToolTip: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set this property to the default text to display in the tooltip.

If you set the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolTipInteraction/delegate] property to an object that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolTipInteractionDelegate] protocol and implements the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIToolTipInteractionDelegate/toolTipInteraction(_:configurationAt:)] method, then the return value of the delegate method determines the text that appears in the tooltip.

## Managing the interaction

- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the tooltip interaction is in the enabled state.
